original_title: After the Game: A 20 Year Look at Three Former Athletes
overview: Three women from a 1999 collegiate basketball team test their limits as they push to reach their athletic potential. Nearly 20 years later, they apply lessons learned from their playing days to different professional, off-the-court challenges.
tagline: Small time athletics. Big time impact.
title: After the Game: A 20 Year Look at Three Former Athletes
